title: Luxury Apartment for Sale
details:
3 bed-room, 2 bath-room luxury Apartment for Sale in the heart of Colombo, Separate domestic quarters with bathroom, marble flooring and pantry-top, burma-teak pantry cupboards, soundproof glass, (Australian sanitaryware [Decina & Caroma] and aluminium), Jacuzzi, door decorations [Lockwood Australia]), central gas system, video intercom, large balconies in all rooms and living area and ample ventilation in all areas of the Apartment.

Rooftop Swimming Pool, Open Terrace and Gymnasium
2 x Lifts, Fully Automatic Generator, 24/7 Security & Maintenance

Hotels, Shopping Centers, Schools, Parks, Restaurants & Cafe's within a brief walk in any direction.

Option to purchase with an existing tenant with a guaranteed rental income of over Rs.230,000,00 per month
